nodes.text: Són Halliikeenovich was a Human male of the House Halliikeenovich, an noble house from the planet Dramassia in the Juvex sector.

He attended the Squid Lake production at the Galaxies Opera House in 19 BBY. He hoped to gain his House prestige by marrying Terr Taneel and joining their Houses. If she returned his interest, it was not obvious to the public.
Són Halliikeenovich is a tuckerization of the name of his portrayer, Jason Hallikainen. He is the husband of Amanda Lucas, who plays Terr Taneel.
